title: UniConnect
description: UniConnect is a mobile application aims to assist university students in finding nearby study mates.
UniConnect offers a variety of features including:
1. Filtering nearby libraries and other study places
framework: Tools/Frameworks: React Native, Feathers.js, OpenAI, Socket.io, MongoDB, Expo

title: Conda Release
description: Conda Release is a software automation tool designed to facilitate faster and more reliable releases for the open-source Python package manager Conda.
Conda-release offers two options of execution:

title: Meal Planner
description: Meal Planner is an Android application that allows users to save their favourite cooking recipes and plan their daily meals
Meal Planner supports parsing URL from certain cooking websites so users can save their favourite recipe with a single link
Meal Planner also provide calorie approximation based on the ingredients from each recipe
framework: Tools/Frameworks: AndroidX, Jsoup, Junit, Joda-Time, Lombok, Gradle

video.description: Adding a Recipe and calculating the calorie

title: Snake
description: This game involves creating a replica of the classic Snake game as a part of the CS349 User Interface course project at the University of Waterloo

title: Sketch It
description: This project was undertaken for the CS349 User Interface course, where the task involved creating a replica of the Windows Paint software with functionalities such as drawing lines, circles, rectangles, erasing, moving shapes, setting fill and line colors, and saving the created sketch
